name: 60 Seconds Trip - Mushrooms
description:
My first experiment with Unreal Engine.

I hope you enjoy the trip! 
The game was made for a game jam. #oneminutejam

You need to collect all pieces of knowledge to open the locked portal. While you do so, please enjoy the visuals, walk on water, but dont forget. Life goes as a minute. Enjoy the trip. The experience is better with headphones ;)

Commands:

  •  WASD to walk
  •  Mouse to look
  •  Shift to Sprint
  •  Space to Jump

Aditional Credits:

  • Music Brainwank (Psycho Foo Edit) - by Colektro
  • Animations and Character - Mixamo
  • High res models, grass and textures by Quixel Megascan
  • Made with Unreal 5
